Flask CRM

  • HTTP Routing Table

HTTP Routing Table

/auth | /customers | /users
 
/auth
POST /auth/login
 
/customers
GET /customers/
GET /customers/(int:customer_id)
POST /customers
PUT /customers/(int:customer_id)
DELETE /customers/(int:customer_id)
 
/users
GET /users/
GET /users/(int:user_id)
POST /users
PUT /users/(int:user_id)
PUT /users/(int:user_id)/change-admin-status
PUT /users/(int:user_id)/change-password
DELETE /users/(int:user_id)
